I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/python/mypy.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python 3.8 image as a base
FROM python:3.8

# Set the working directory inside the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install required dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -U pip setuptools
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r mypy-requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r test-requirements.txt

# Run the test suite to verify the installation
RUN python -m pytest
